segments.text: How do you dispose of the waste in your factory ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We try to recycle as much as we can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the rest ? How do you get rid of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have to send it to landfill . It's very expensive because the government recently introduced a landfill tax so we're planning to build a new incineration plant next year to burn our waste .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But doesn't incineration produce carbon monoxide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're right , it does . But we believe it's less harmful to the environment than landfill
segments.speaker: S2
